In my humble opinion Portal 2 is the best game out there that utilises portals. The story is well concieved and I love the addition of wheatley, Stephen Merchant is the perfect voice for him.
I also like on the pc version how you can customise your own chambers, share them with friends and play along with them in co-op mode.

Portal 2 is one of those games you should never miss. One of those games you must play to achieve gaming maturity.
Even if you don't like puzzle games the dark humour, intelligent design and endless story will more than compensate you.
Portal 2 is universal and can be played on almost any rig.

Only just started playing but it is awesome.
Great graphics, smooth gameplay and I love the co-op feature.
Love this game, if you haven't already, you should buy it.

I just completed the game. It's probably the best puzzle game I've ever played~

Wir schätzen das spiel auf der 10-Punkte-System:
Teleportation - 10/10
Robots - 10/10
Demolition - 2/10
Enemies - 8/10
Die bewegung der charaktere - 9/10
Diligence Gabe - 9/10
Das spiel ist groß, aber nicht ein paar Fehler drin:
Sie können ganz einfach unter oder textur bekommen, es zu.
Zasstryat zu teleportieren.
Selbstzerstörungs einfach so, ohne es zu Ihrem wunsch.
Im allgemeinen ist das spiel verdient aufmerksamkeit und respekt, denn das ist eine andere kühle Spiel von Valvil nach L4D.
9/10.

Nem véletlenül a legmagasabbra értékelt játék Steamen. Nagyon közel van ahhoz hogy tökéletesnek lehessen nevezni. Fantasztikus történet, remek látványvilág, szerethető, humoros karakterek, nagyon jó szinkronhangokkal, hibátlan játékmenettel és "beszippantó" hangulattal.

Szigorúan angolul kell játszani, mert a magyarra fordított felirat botrányosan rossz.

Kötelező!
GET THIS GAME

No jogo não tem bolo, mas tem enredo excelente, puzzles muito bem elaborado e divertido, grafico muito bom para um jogo de 2011, 2 personagens carismaticos, sistema de co-op que é o dobro de diversão comparado ao single-player, tem referencia ao Borealis (joguem a série Half-Life), tem as camarâs de teste da comunidade (workshop), resumindo, tem tudo de bom no jogo onde você pode passar horas jogando, se tiver um amigo que gosta de puzzle compra pra ele também, vale muito a pena.
Хорошая игра ! (для выполнения задания ) :D

For:
1. Classic puzzle game.
2. More story rich than the first one with nice plot twists.
3. Humoristic content enhance the play all along the game.
4. Voice acting is great. 
5. Run nice without crashing on my average PC.
CON:
1. Graphic is of course a bit dated but nice looking.
2. Could have used more complex puzzles. (Mods could compensate, I guess.)
3. During the little time I spent on co-op I though that load time was a bit slow.

Definitively a great enjoyable and different game that should have a high place on your shelve of great classics.
